attributes.action: Pay my import duty on something I bought from America
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If he pays it i'll vote for him, if not then David Cameron get's my vote!

I refuse to pay at extortional amount after my parents have payed into the system for years and got nothing back (apart from two dead relatives which could have been avoided if it were not for incompetent doctors)

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
